LanguageData.ARA_Plasteel_Shell_Hediff.label: Plasteel Carapace
LanguageData.ARA_Plasteel_Shell_Hediff.description: The Arachnid Zerg embedded plasteel directly into their carapace, greatly enhancing their defense.
LanguageData.ARA_Shell_Thorn_Hediff.label: Carapace Thorns
LanguageData.ARA_Shell_Thorn_Hediff.description: The Arachnid Zerg embedded two rows of thorn tubes into their carapace, which automatically attack approaching enemies with thorns when not engaged in melee combat.
LanguageData.ARA_Reactive_Shell_Hediff.label: Reactive Carapace
LanguageData.ARA_Reactive_Shell_Hediff.description: The Arachnid Zerg's reactive carapace can negate a single instance of external damage, but the carapace is then blown off, losing its defensive capability.
LanguageData.ARA_Gene_Essence_Shell_Hediff.label: Carapace Proliferation
LanguageData.ARA_Gene_Essence_Shell_Hediff.descriptio: This Arachnid Zerg's carapace has gained extra defense by thickening with chitin.
LanguageData.ARA_Strengthening_Tendon_Hediff.label: Strengthening Tendons
LanguageData.ARA_Strengthening_Tendon_Hediff.descript: The Arachnid Zerg's reinforced tendons allow for high-speed movement and jumping ability.
LanguageData.ARA_Slide_Patagium_Hediff.label: Gliding Patagium
LanguageData.ARA_Slide_Patagium_Hediff.description: The gliding patagium on the Arachnid Zerg's legs allows for high-speed movement over Creep. However, the effect is quickly lost when away from the Creep.
LanguageData.ARA_Slide_Patagium_Hediff.stages.0.label: None
LanguageData.ARA_Huge_Stomach_Hediff.label: Additional Gastric Sac
LanguageData.ARA_Huge_Stomach_Hediff.description: Directional mutation in the Arachnid Zerg has resulted in a larger gastric sac, allowing them to store more nutrients.
LanguageData.ARA_Internal_Circulation_Lung_Hediff.des: Directional mutation in the Arachnid Zerg has allowed their lungs to perform self-circulation, enabling them to withstand invasion in near-vacuum conditions.
LanguageData.ARA_Cycle_Suppression_Hediff.label: Lifecycle Suppression
LanguageData.ARA_Cycle_Suppression_Hediff.description: The Arachnid Zerg's lifecycle suppressor inhibits the Zerg's disorderly growth and prolongs their lifespan.
LanguageData.ARA_Acidling_Pouch_Hediff.label: Acidling Egg Sac
LanguageData.ARA_Acidling_Pouch_Hediff.description: The Arachnid Zerg's egg sac contains numerous Acidlings close to hatching, which immediately burst out and attack enemies upon command.
LanguageData.ARA_Tumor_Pouch_Hediff.label: Tumor Egg Sac
LanguageData.ARA_Tumor_Pouch_Hediff.description: The Arachnid Zerg's egg sac contains dead Creep Tumors, which, upon release, change the surrounding ground into Creep terrain.
